


########### next target ###############
set(HFILES
  wslay_session_test.h
  wslay_frame_test.h
  wslay_event_test.h
  wslay_queue_test.h
)

set(OBJECTS
  main.c
  wslay_frame_test.c
  wslay_event_test.c
  wslay_queue_test.c
)


set(main_SRCS ${HFILES} ${OBJECTS})

if(BUILD_TESTS)

add_executable(main ${main_SRCS})

target_link_libraries(main wslay cunit)

endif(BUILD_TESTS)

########### install files ###############
